page.title: 07Ecology
page.content: The most common birds are sparrows and blackbirds.Rooks and jackdaws are often seen on farmlands.Swallows and house martins nest on buildings.The large pond in the park has geese and ducks.The most frequently seen mammals are rabbits and grey squirrels.Badgers and hedgehogs are not so easily seen because they are nocturnal.Field mice are so called because they live in fields and rats are often found on farms.Rabbits live in meadows whilst weasels and stoats spend their time mostly in woodland areas.The beech is the most common tree in the area as it likes living on chalkland.Also there are some oak,ash, silver birches and some coniferous trees. There are many invertebrates. Amphibians are found near water but reptiles are seldom seen.
